A case was opened with a short description of FW:  View agreement record [-Confidential-]
A longer description includes ________________________________
From: ZIPHER (Edicta Now) SPAL <SalesPushActionLink@edicta.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 28, 2022 7:39:36 AM (UTC-05:00) Eastern Time (US & Canada)
To: ZIPHER (Edicta Now) Sales Open Agreements <SalesOpenAgreements@edicta.com>
Subject: FW: View the agreement record [-Confidential-]

CONFIDENTIAL



From: Nichol, Shawna <Shawna.Nichol@makesure.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 27, 2022 2:09 PM
To: ZIPHER (Edicta) SPAL <SalesPushActionLink@edicta.com>; Robertson, Patrick <Patrick. Robertson@makesure.com>; Hughes, Violet <Violet.Hughes@makesure.com>
Cc: Booker, Frankie C. (Edicta Now) <Frankie.Booker@edicta.com>
Subject: RE: View the agreement record [-Confidential-]

WARNING: This email comes from an external source, so please exercise caution and refrain from clicking on any links or opening attachments unless you can identify the sender and are confident the content is secure.


Data Risk Classification: [-Confidential-]
The below is the completed record

From: ZIPHER (Edicta Now) SPAL <SalesPushActionLink@edicta .com<mailto:SalesPushActionLink@edicta.com>>
Sent: Monday, September 26, 2022 2:31 PM
To: Robertson, Patrick <Patrick. Robertson@makesure.com><mailto:Patrick. Robertson@makesure.com>>; Hughes, Violet <Violet.Hughes@makesure.com<mailto:Violet.Hughes@makesure.com>>; Nichol, Shawna <Shawna.Nichol@makesure.com<mailto:Shawna.Nichol@makesure.com>>
Cc: Booker, Frankie C. (Edicta Now) <Frankie.Booker@edicta.com<Frankie.Booker@edicta.com>>
Subject:  View the agreement record [-Confidential-]

CONFIDENTIAL

"Please find the attached Open Agreement Record, which includes loans that have been approved for mortgage insurance but are not yet activated. Kindly review the document to confirm whether mortgage insurance has been activated for the relevant loans.
If you regularly receive this report, you may observe that the borrowers' personal identifiable information has been removed. This step has been taken as part of our continuous efforts to ensure the security of your borrowers' data.

Note: For Accucert customers, loans can still be activated using that process.
Because there is consumer data in this file, it is protected with a password in order to comply with our Privacy Policies. A second email containing the password will be sent to you.

Directions:

* Select the applicable ""Action"" for each loan in the open agreement record
""Action"" definitions:
1. Activate = Mortgage insurance needed since zero monthly loan has closed (Loan closing date should be given)
2. Cancel = Mortgage insurance not needed.
3. Unknown = Could not find loan in our system, etc.
4. Pending = Loan not closed or unknown status. No action needed at this time.
o If Activate is selected, a loan closing date must be provided (mm/dd/yy) (Zero monthly only)
o If Cancel, Pending or Unknown is selected, do not provide a loan closing date
o If incorrect Lender Loan Number, supply the correct number
o If any other data is incorrect, kindly reach out to Customer Support at 800-436-5624.

Note: If activate is selected and no date is given, the message, ""Date is Required"" will appear alongside that loan.

* For the fastest response time, e-mail the completed record to SalesPushActionLink@edicta.com<mailto:SalesPushActionLink.edicta.com>. (Failure to submit the record will result in a delay in processing.)

WARNING: When the open agreement record is complete, click on File, Save, and Close. Go back to the open email including the spreadsheet and click Forward to send it back to SalesPushActionLink@edicta.com<mailto:SalesPushActionLink.edicta.com>. (DO NOT USE THE REPLY BUTTON). When you close the email, click Yes to save all changes. A copy of the updated email will be saved in your Sent Items for future reference.

IMPORTANT: If you received this email by mistake, please inform the sender right away and delete the original message from your computer. Thank you for cooperating."
 






This email is private and intended solely for the recipient. Unauthorized copying, forwarding, or use of the information by any person other than the intended recipient is prohibited. If you received this email by mistake, please inform the sender right away and delete the original message.
